website_summaries.verdict: A two-wheeled dolly specifically designed to help you carry two 5-gallon buckets.
pros: Big tires can roll over rough terrain
Easy to move when the buckets are full – even with just one hand
cons: If you want to take it on the go, the bucket buddy does not fold for storage

customer_reviews.title: More Affordable 2 Bucket System
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy detailing my SUV weekly, but dragging the buckets around gets old fast. Most of the 2 bucket carriers are pricey. The Bucket Buddy works quite well to move full/heavy buckets quickly and easily. I would have given it 5 stars, but the design of the base, with the buckets sitting on a single cross piece, is not as steady as I would like. I added a couple of inexpensive foam pieces between the bucket and the ring which helps a lot.
customer_reviews.author: PrimeTime

customer_reviews.title: I like that I can roll these around where I am working
customer_reviews.text: I really like the Bucket Buddy. I can roll it around where I am transplanting or repotting. I keep Potting Soil in one bucket and sand in another one. This is my 2nd set, I had to have two more for Pea Gravel. Assembly was fairly easy (I am 75 but do a lot ) the only thing I found was that when you need to file because I found burrs and when I tried to screw it together it would not fit, just go around each hold with your file.
customer_reviews.author: Judy L. Sturdivant

customer_reviews.title: Essential tool for two-bucket wash!
customer_reviews.text: This is a phenomenal tool. I use this performing a two-bucket wash when detailing my cars. It reduces the time required to perform a wash by not wasting steps returning to the buckets and not wasting effort lifting and moving buckets. I used some Loctite 242 (aka Blue Loctite) on the bolts when I assembled my unit to assure they would not come loose over time but still be able to unbolt them if needed. Note that the tires will initially have a strong odor when you first unpack the unit, so I recommend assembling this is a well-ventilated area. The odor dissipates after a few days. If you enjoy detailing your cars, buy this!
customer_reviews.author: G. E. Swain

customer_reviews.title: The cart works great - 10 minutes to assembly
customer_reviews.text: The box arrived with poor packaging, but that is more of a seller issue and not a product issue. My first image of the box is exactly how it arrived. Inside are a few metal pipe pieces and three nuts / bolts to assemble. The item was easy to assemble. The holes for the bolts are slightly too small and some hammering had to happen to get them to fit. A little bit poor quality control on that avenue. Other than that it was fine. It took maybe 10 minutes tops to assemble. The cart works great and is exactly what I imagined it would be. The buckets do not come with the kit.
customer_reviews.author: BH

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy but useful
customer_reviews.text: It wobbled pretty badly, the screws go thru the holes with a lot of coaxing and a hammer, but it is not really stable. I finally ended up JB welding the joints and screws and its fine now. I would buy it again. I am a woman farmer and my elbows were starting to get really achy from hauling around full 5 gallon buckets as well as other heavy things during the day. At least I've made a dent in the work load and it pulls thru the desert sand pretty well with 2-5 gallon buckets full of duck slop.
customer_reviews.author: Davilyn Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Great for 2 Bucket Car wash
customer_reviews.text: I have a sloped driveway and the Bucket Buddy allows me to effortlessly move the wash buckets around without the need to lift and carry from one side of the car to the other. I purchased a conventional two bucket dolly for car washing and the slope of my driveway made it useless. The Bucket Buddy is a great addition to my car detailing armamentarium.
customer_reviews.author: Albert

customer_reviews.title: Great back saver!
customer_reviews.text: My husband has a history of back problems and recently threw his back out picking up a bucket. So we ordered this and has been great; because he washes our vehicles often this has been a back saver as he can just wheel it around the vehicles as needed. I would highly recommend this to anyone. The merchant is very responsive also when needing assistance.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best. Look @ my video on YouTube.
customer_reviews.text: I just received my bucket buddy from UPS and just like it says only 5 min to put together it took me less lol I just have to say I'm so glad that I didn't get one of the others this will serve me for years to come. I detail car's and the B B is just what I needed, you can see my setup on YouTube Styles pretty work detailing and spa. Look at detailing tools pt 2 video this is a detailer must have.
customer_reviews.author: Styles PWD

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy, value for money is low
customer_reviews.text: Not for use with weight. Had buckets filled with rock and it is showing signs of bending the whole thing. I had to drill out the holes in order to get the provided bolts through them for assembly. The handle slides right off of it while pulling the cart.
customer_reviews.author: Zac S.

customer_reviews.title: Good for apartment dwellers too
customer_reviews.text: The bucket nearest the handle will tip. It needs further support underneath. Also the handles to your buckets will get fowled in the support rings. Lastly the tires are some super-cheap stinky rubber that is not getting any more pleasant. If there was a different option, I would buy it but for now this will do. Make more sense than those clumsy double-bucket caster systems for twice the money. Good for apartment dwellers too!
customer_reviews.author: PerfectBike

customer_reviews.title: lots of different use
customer_reviews.text: This bucket caddy is great! I've been using this for auto detailing, And a "two bucket wash" (one for rinse water and one with soap water) it feels sturdy and gets the job done. Not sure that it would be my first choice for hauling buckets of rock or dirt around the yard all day/every day. But.. if you wanted to store & haul your sand/salt, kids toys, sports equipment, etc.. I'd say this would work great.
customer_reviews.author: shane l jantzen

customer_reviews.title: I love the bucket buddy
customer_reviews.text: I love the bucket buddy! This is such a helpful garden tool. I have one bucket, with the bucket boss in it as well as all my hand tools, pruners and gloves and the second one that I put weeds and clippings in to dispose of. It is so convenient to push around to all parts of my yard. It was easy to put together. I am so pleased with this simple yet wonderful garden helper!!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: I am going to buy another one for my brother, he is going to love it.
customer_reviews.text: This is the most convenient item I have bought in a long time. It is easy to setup and even easier to use. I carry all sorts of stuff around my yard. I also do gold prospecting and the bucket buddy makes carrying all my gear down to the river's edge a snap. No more having to make numerous trips back and forth. I am going to buy another one for my brother, he is going to love it.
customer_reviews.author: Denis

customer_reviews.title: A fantastic acquaintance for detailing
customer_reviews.text: Been using the Bucket Buddy for almost a year now, washing & detailing vehicles. I can get around a vehicle quickly, no longer have to lumber around two buckets as I do my two bucket method. Less than 10 minutes to assemble with a 13mm on both ends and good to go. Wheels have held up, everything is rigid, and affordable! Would highly recommend to anyone in detailing.
customer_reviews.author: M. Di Vita

customer_reviews.title: ALL PURPOSE BUCKET BUDDY!!!!
customer_reviews.text: All purpose cart to use in so many ways! I purchased this for $35.99 but within hours it went up to $45.99! It's $35.99 thru Home Depot so that's the only way I'd purchase another. I got this to aid me as I paint my house. For all those who's done the same I now no longer have to carry around my 5 gallon paint bucket but can refill my 5 gallon paint bucket, with a painting screen, & not have to carry the paint but can push it around!!!! Love it!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Didi

customer_reviews.title: Save Your Back!
customer_reviews.text: This is one handy item! I use 5 gal buckets all the time and as I'm a senior citizen lady was having trouble moving them from place to place. Not any more! I just leave the buckets in the Bucket Buddy and I'm all set, hassle free. It's sturdy and smooth running, went together in a flash. A real helper!
customer_reviews.author: karla kenyonTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Back saver
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for trash pick up and the dredded dog mess clean up. I live on an acre with 2 large dogs, and my back isn't as young as i wish was anymore. I throw 2 buckets in it and im good to go. Really saves my back from over use.
customer_reviews.author: K.T.

customer_reviews.title: Works really well especially on smooth surfaces!
customer_reviews.text: Holy cow this works, and I use it to move things around the yard, putting things on top of the buckets as well. It is not as sturdy as I needed it to be at the local park to water trees. Over rough land and with 2 five gallon pails of water, it doesn't work as well. But on smooth surfaces and for short distances, it is a back saver. Delivered quickly and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Book Paladin

customer_reviews.title: Very Well Made...
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. Built for the long haul. A tool that allows you to use the two bucket system for auto washing. Soap bucket and rinse bucket. Outfit your buckets with the Grit Guard Inserts.
customer_reviews.author: AGumb

customer_reviews.title: I would've expected an item to be used in a construction like setting to be a little more
customer_reviews.text: Im a resent arm amputee and bought this product to help me around the yard. It was not very long in use when I started to notice rusting in the areas where the buckets would rub against the frame. The color also faded rather quickly. I would've expected an item to be used in a construction like setting to be a little more durable
customer_reviews.author: demdare

customer_reviews.title: Great for baseball buckets
customer_reviews.text: Great for baseball buckets. I use it for the weighted heavy balls and a bucket of regular baseballs. I do wish the handle had a push pins to easily take off.
customer_reviews.author: CTuttle48

customer_reviews.title: every detailer should own one
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I was looking for. I use the two bucket method and this allows to easily move the buckets around the vehicle. This beats lugging the bucket by hand. Item is well built and I have no complaints thus far.
customer_reviews.author: Badtz

customer_reviews.title: very handy to have around
customer_reviews.text: very handy to have around. solid construction. I use this for a two bucket car washing system. I'm sure you'll think of may other ways to employ this product.
customer_reviews.author: TCC

customer_reviews.title: Works Extremely well
customer_reviews.text: Works extremely well I whish I would have bought one of these years ago. We use it to carry feed out to the coops and pens.
customer_reviews.author: Poppabear

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Coolest thing for when I am washing my truck. Wash and rinse process!
customer_reviews.author: CafoneCreations

customer_reviews.title: I love not having to constantly pick up and move both ...
customer_reviews.text: I use the Bucket Buddy for car washing using the 2 bucket method. I love not having to constantly pick up and move both wash buckets anymore. Quality is just OK, hopefully it lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I do stucco and this works great for getting them heavy buckets where they need to be.
customer_reviews.author: THE JOE

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I have 2; 6 gal buckets that fir and held up full of rocks
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: It seems like a decent product but for $45
customer_reviews.text: I assumed by the picture and the price that cart this included the buckets, I assumed wrong. It seems like a decent product but for $45.00 it's not worth it on its own.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon M.

customer_reviews.title: Totally Convenient!!!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great buy!! I have been looking for a product that could help me move things around my house without having to drag it. A close friend suggested the Bucket Buddy so I tried it out. This product is so helpful. I have arthritis in my fingers which makes it very difficult to move heavy, everyday things but now that I bought the Bucket Buddy it gives me the freedom to do a lot more. The family and I even go and pick apples with our new Bucket Buddy. It's very helpful and handy. Highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: Chris
